column4: how is it, that after apparently successfully completing a i386 8.04 Server install that SAW, and PARTITIONED, and INSTALLED to a 6-drive RAID, when i reboot from the installer, the systen doesn't come up... ??
was there a 6.06/1 SERVER i386 iso ??
iirc you need a /boot partition outside of the raid, but #ubuntu-server probably has more knowing people
